description: Interprets raw test findings (port scan results, TLS issues, SSH vulnerabilities, BACnet findings), maps them to Electracom severity levels, and generates structured remediation recommendations with override justification templates

example_response.severity: Severity level: Critical, High, Medium, or Low
example_response.severity_rationale: Brief explanation of why this severity was assigned
example_response.remediation: Detailed remediation recommendation with actionable steps in markdown
example_response.override_justification: Template override justification text for EDQ override forms
example_response.related_tests: Comma-separated list of related EDQ test numbers and names
example_response.additional_context: Any additional context, notes, or recommendations
